snippet.title: Satanic - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Watch the latest Satanic trailer to see gameplay and creepy locations from this upcoming first-person survival horror game about escaping a satanic cult. Hunted by a relentless demon that responds to your actions, you must avoid detection, scavenge for resources, and navigate your way through an ex-soviet missile silo deep below the surface. Satanic will be available on PC, and a demo is out now.
